headline: Waste Management, Inc. (WM): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Waste Management, Inc. on Rigatoni Capital’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on WM. Waste Management, Inc.’s share was trading at $216.18 as of January 13th. WM’s trailing and forward P/E were 34.04 and 25.71 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
